author: rpluem
msg: * Introduce apr_brigade_split_ex. apr_brigade_split_ex allows to reuse
an already existing brigade instead of creating a new one. Thus it
can be used to lower the memory footprint where brigades need to be
split many times during the lifetime of a pool.

author: niq
msg: Switch ftp_directory_charset and interpolate_env in proxy_dir_conf,
with a major MMN bump.  As suggested by rpluem in r661069 to enable
backport *without* a major bump (ABI breakage) in 2.2.x.

author: dkulp
msg: add some fake line numbers into the generated wrapper helper to hopefully help debugging
